de.eckhartarnold.client
Class HTMLLayout 

java.lang.Object
  de.eckhartarnold.client.Layout
      de.eckhartarnold.client.HTMLLayout

public class HTMLLayout
				
extends Layout

Class HTMLLayout allows to code the layout of the image panel, control panel and caption in HTML.

Insances of the class are instantiated with a chunk of HTML code. The elements of the slide show, i.e. control panel, image panel and caption will be attached by to tags (or DOM elements respectively) that have the ids "display", "controlPanel" and "caption" of the HTML code.

Author:
ecki

The constructor of class HTMLLayout .

collection - the image collection info object

configuration - the configuration string of the layout

Method Detail

getRootWidget

public com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getRootWidget()
Description copied from class: Layout
Returns the root widget of the layout. The widget can be inserted anywhere in a web site. After attaching the root widget to the web site, method issueResize should be called to make sure that the layout's size is adjusted properly.

Specified by:
getRootWidget in class Layout
Returns:
the root widget of the layout
